description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国人事部副部长，以及第八届、第九届全国政协委员。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Personnel and was a member of the 8th and 9th National Committees of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国陕西省下辖的一个县，是张汉夫的出生地。
description.en: A county in Shaanxi Province, China, and the birthplace of Zhang Hanfu.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，张汉夫是其政治人物。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia where Zhang Hanfu is a political figure.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国人事部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国人事部
en: Ministry of Personnel of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经的组成部门，负责管理国家的人事工作。张汉夫曾在此担任副部长。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for managing the state's personnel affairs. Zhang Hanfu served as its Vice Minister.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国组织。张汉夫曾是其第八届和第九届委员。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference. Zhang Hanfu was a member of its 8th and 9th committees.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。张汉夫是其党员。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China. Zhang Hanfu is a member.

description.zh-cn: 根据文本，张汉夫是陕西绥德人。
description.en: According to the text, Zhang Hanfu is from Suide, Shaanxi.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国人事部

description.zh-cn: 张汉夫曾担任中华人民共和国人事部副部长。
description.en: Zhang Hanfu served as Vice Minister of the Ministry of Personnel of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 张汉夫曾任第八届、第九届全国政协委员。
description.en: Zhang Hanfu was a member of the 8th and 9th National Committees of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类信息，张汉夫是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to the page's category information, Zhang Hanfu is a member of the Communist Party of China.
